title: If Ekko gets all of that damage, utility, and mobility
body:
Why would he also get a free escape that also does a fuckton of damage and heals him at the same time? Did I mention it's range is global?  And that it costs no mana?

I'm going to copy and paste this because most people keep bringing it up:

With his passive, q, and e he has a total of 1.7 AP Ratio and one of his abilities applies on hit effects. Don't forget the passive on W for even more damage.

With all of her abilities used Akali has a 1.8 AP Ratio with one of her abilities doing physical damage. Meanwhile she has a pathetic slow as utility while Ekko has a fuckton more and no %health damage like Ekko does. So she gets 0.1 higher AP Ratio and in exchange for slightly lower damage without landing his ult on one person Ekko gets a fuckton more than Akali does in his kit.

I could go over more Assassins but that's basically the idea for most of them.

Lux's and Viktor's E in particular cost a staggering *130* mana to cast at max rank, and Veigar needs to expend at *least* 210 mana to do any real damage - and even then, relies on the enemy screwing up. Ekko by comparison can spam whatever the hell he likes because his mana costs aren't sky-high, and he *never* has to worry about not having mana for his Ultimate.

And if you can't get off another auto to make up for the missed Q stack, you're down another .7, to a measly .4 AP ratio.
